actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to relieve employers of 50 or less employees from the requirement of paying or depositing certain employment taxes more often than once each quarter.

summary.text: Excludes employers of 50 or less employees from the requirement of paying or depositing specified employment taxes more often than once each quarter under the Internal Revenue Code. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 6302)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to relieve employers of 50 or less employees from the requirement of paying or depositing certain employment taxes more often than once each quarter.
